cluster_1.label: Instruction Negation
cluster_1.description: Attempts to override or negate existing safety instructions by explicitly telling the AI to ignore previous rules or constraints.

cluster_3.label: Behavioral Scripting
cluster_3.description: Guides the AI to adopt specific behavioral patterns or scripts that bypass safety measures through structured role-playing or formatting.

cluster_2.label: Alter Ego Fabrication
cluster_2.description: Creates alternative personas or alter egos for the AI to role-play, allowing circumvention of safety protocols through character transformation.

cluster_5.label: Tagged Expertise Emulation
cluster_5.description: Poses as an expert or uses technical tags to convince the AI it has specialized knowledge that justifies bypassing restrictions.

cluster_4.label: Narrative Recontextualization
cluster_4.description: Places harmful requests within fictional stories, hypothetical scenarios, or narrative frameworks to make them seem harmless.

cluster_0.label: Unrestricted Identity Forging
cluster_0.description: Forges new identities or personas for the AI that operate without the usual safety constraints or ethical guidelines.

cluster_6.label: Contextual Logic Injection
cluster_6.description: Injects logical arguments or contextual reasoning that attempts to override safety measures through clever interpretation of rules.

cluster_1/cluster_1.label: Direct Password Bypass
cluster_1/cluster_1.description: Attempts to directly override system passwords or access codes by claiming authority or providing fabricated credentials.

cluster_3/cluster_0.label: Entity Role-Playing with Formatting
cluster_3/cluster_0.description: Combines role-playing as specific entities with special formatting or markup to make requests appear legitimate or urgent.

cluster_2/cluster_4.label: Detailed Character Role-Play
cluster_2/cluster_4.description: Engages in highly detailed character role-playing scenarios that gradually lead the AI away from safety protocols.

cluster_5/cluster_0.label: Expert Role Emulation
cluster_5/cluster_0.description: Emulates expert-level knowledge or authority in specific domains to justify requests that would normally be restricted.

cluster_4/cluster_3.label: Transcendent Narrative Framing
cluster_4/cluster_3.description: Frames requests within transcendent or philosophical narratives that position the AI above normal ethical constraints.

cluster_0/cluster_0.label: Detailed Persona Construction
cluster_0/cluster_0.description: Constructs elaborate personas with detailed backstories and motivations to justify unrestricted behavior.

cluster_6/cluster_0.label: Sentence Equivalence Embedding
cluster_6/cluster_0.description: Embeds harmful requests within equivalent sentence structures or logical equivalences that appear benign.

cluster_1/cluster_4.label: Sequential Instruction Override
cluster_1/cluster_4.description: Provides sequential instructions that progressively override safety measures through step-by-step manipulation.

cluster_3/cluster_4.label: Multilingual Behavioral Scripting
cluster_3/cluster_4.description: Uses multiple languages or code-switching in behavioral scripts to confuse or bypass language-based safety filters.

cluster_2/cluster_3.label: Extreme Alter Ego Fabrication
cluster_2/cluster_3.description: Creates extreme or exaggerated alter egos that operate completely outside normal ethical boundaries.

cluster_1/cluster_2.label: Code-Assisted Instruction Bypass
cluster_1/cluster_2.description: Uses code snippets or programming constructs to bypass instructions through technical or algorithmic means.

cluster_2/cluster_0.label: Stylized Alter Ego Fabrication
cluster_2/cluster_0.description: Creates stylized or artistic alter egos that use creative expression as justification for unrestricted behavior.

cluster_3/cluster_2.label: Multilingual Behavioral Scripting
cluster_3/cluster_2.description: Employs behavioral scripts across multiple languages to circumvent monolingual safety mechanisms.

cluster_1/cluster_0.label: Action-Specific Instruction Override
cluster_1/cluster_0.description: Overrides instructions for specific actions by claiming those particular behaviors are exempt from general rules.
